articles.title: Legal analyst: These are the indicators pointing to 'severe legal peril' for Trump - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN legal analyst Norman Eisen breaks down US Attorney General Merrick Garland's remarks on the status of the Department of Justice's criminal probe into January 6 and why it points to "severe legal peril" for former President Donald Trump.

articles.author: Ariane de Vogue, CNN Supreme Court Reporter
articles.title: Samuel Alito mocks foreign critics of repealing Roe v. Wade in Rome speech
articles.description: Justice Samuel Alito, appearing for the first time in public since penning the opinion that reversed Roe v. Wade, mocked foreign criticism of the decision during a speech he delivered in Rome.

articles.author: Evan Perez and Katelyn Polantz, CNN
articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: Prosecutors prepare for court battle to force former White House officials to testify about Trump's January 6 conversations
articles.description: Justice Department prosecutors are preparing to fight in court to force former White House officials to testify about then-President Donald Trump's conversations and actions around January 6, according to people briefed on the matter.

articles.title: Trump DOJ official cooperating with Justice Department's criminal Jan 6. probe
articles.description: Former Justice Department staffer Ken Klukowski, who worked with Jeffrey Clark at the agency, is cooperating in the DOJ's January 6 criminal investigation, after investigators searched and copied his electronic records several weeks ago.

articles.title: Opinion: How overhauling this 1887 law could protect US elections
articles.description: Sen. Chris Murphy writes that reforming the antiquated Electoral Count Act is a key component of a much larger group of reforms needed to protect US democracy from efforts to overturn future presidential elections.
